article_title: 4 Quotes That Say Everything You Need to Know About the Iran Deal
article_text:
Earlier Thursday, Secretary John Kerry admitted live on-air what we've known to be true about the Iran deal all along: some U.S. funds incorporated into the agreement will make their way into the hands of terrorist organizations. In case Kerry's statement wasn't enough, here are quotes from other top-level members of the administration - including the president himself - with their very own admissions of guilt.

Does the Obama Administration think the American people are this dumb? No thank you, Mr. President. We don't want any part of this "deal."

article_metadata.author: Townhall.com Staff

Does the Obama Administration think the American people are this dumb?
In case Kerry's statement wasn't enough, here are quotes from other top-level members of the administration - including the president himself - with their very own admissions of guilt.
Earlier Thursday, Secretary John Kerry admitted live on-air what we've known to be true about the Iran deal all along: some U.S. funds incorporated into the agreement will make their way into the hands of terrorist organizations.
We don't want any part of this "deal."
No thank you, Mr. President.
